blocks.name: incexc
blocks.content: The inclusion/exclusion principle for counting the elements of a finite union of finite sets. This is Metamath 100 proof #96. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2017.)

blocks.name: incexc2
blocks.content: The inclusion/exclusion principle for counting the elements of a finite union of finite sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2017.)
